conversations

messages

Try it

cURL

Python

JavaScript

PHP

Go

Java

Copy

```
curl --request GET \
  --url https://app.chatwoot.com/api/v1/accounts/{account_id}/conversations/{conversation_id}/messages \
  --header 'api_access_token: <api-key>'
```

200

401

404

#### Authorizations

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/messages/get-messages#authorization-api-access-token)

api\_access\_token

string

header

required

This token can be obtained by visiting the profile page or via rails console. Provides access to endpoints based on the user permissions levels. This token can be saved by an external system when user is created via API, to perform activities on behalf of the user.

#### Path Parameters

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/messages/get-messages#parameter-account-id)

account\_id

integer

required

The numeric ID of the account

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/messages/get-messages#parameter-conversation-id)

conversation\_id

integer

required

The numeric ID of the conversation

#### Response

200

200401404

application/json

Success

meta

object

object\[\]

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/messages/get-messages#response-additional-attributes)

additional\_attributes

object

The object containing additional attributes related to the contact

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/messages/get-messages#response-availability-status)

availability\_status

string

The availability status of the contact

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/messages/get-messages#response-email)

email

string

The email address of the contact

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/messages/get-messages#response-id)

id

integer

The ID of the contact

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/messages/get-messages#response-name)

name

string

The name of the contact

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/messages/get-messages#response-phone-number)

phone\_number

string

The phone number of the contact

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/messages/get-messages#response-blocked)

blocked

boolean

Whether the contact is blocked

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/messages/get-messages#response-identifier)

identifier

string

The identifier of the contact

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/messages/get-messages#response-thumbnail)

thumbnail

string

The thumbnail of the contact

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/messages/get-messages#response-custom-attributes)

custom\_attributes

object

The custom attributes of the contact

Example:

```
{
  "attribute_key": "attribute_value",
  "signed_up_at": "dd/mm/yyyy"
}
```

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/messages/get-messages#response-last-activity-at)

last\_activity\_at

integer

The last activity at of the contact

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/messages/get-messages#response-created-at)

created\_at

integer

The created at of the contact

contact\_inboxes

object\[\]

Show child attributes

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/messages/get-messages#response-source-id)

source\_id

string

Contact Inbox Source Id

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/messages/get-messages#response-inbox)

inbox

object

Show child attributes

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/messages/get-messages#response-meta-assignee)

meta.assignee

object

Show child attributes

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/messages/get-messages#response-meta-assignee-id)

meta.assignee.id

integer

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/messages/get-messages#response-meta-assignee-account-id)

meta.assignee.account\_id

integer

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/messages/get-messages#response-meta-assignee-availability-status)

meta.assignee.availability\_status

enum<string>

The availability status of the agent computed by Chatwoot.

Available options:

`available`,

`busy`,

`offline`

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/messages/get-messages#response-meta-assignee-auto-offline)

meta.assignee.auto\_offline

boolean

Whether the availability status of agent is configured to go offline automatically when away.

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/messages/get-messages#response-meta-assignee-confirmed)

meta.assignee.confirmed

boolean

Whether the agent has confirmed their email address.

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/messages/get-messages#response-meta-assignee-email)

meta.assignee.email

string

The email of the agent

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/messages/get-messages#response-meta-assignee-available-name)

meta.assignee.available\_name

string

The available name of the agent

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/messages/get-messages#response-meta-assignee-name)

meta.assignee.name

string

The name of the agent

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/messages/get-messages#response-meta-assignee-role)

meta.assignee.role

enum<string>

The role of the agent

Available options:

`agent`,

`administrator`

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/messages/get-messages#response-meta-assignee-thumbnail)

meta.assignee.thumbnail

string

The thumbnail of the agent

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/messages/get-messages#response-meta-assignee-custom-role-id)

meta.assignee.custom\_role\_id

integer

The custom role id of the agent

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/messages/get-messages#response-meta-agent-last-seen-at)

meta.agent\_last\_seen\_at

string

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/messages/get-messages#response-meta-assignee-last-seen-at)

meta.assignee\_last\_seen\_at

string

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/messages/get-messages#response-payload)

payload

object\[\]

Array of messages

Show child attributes

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/messages/get-messages#response-id)

id

number

The ID of the message

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/messages/get-messages#response-content)

content

string

The text content of the message

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/messages/get-messages#response-account-id)

account\_id

number

The ID of the account

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/messages/get-messages#response-inbox-id)

inbox\_id

number

The ID of the inbox

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/messages/get-messages#response-conversation-id)

conversation\_id

number

The ID of the conversation

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/messages/get-messages#response-message-type)

message\_type

enum<integer>

The type of the message

Available options:

`0`,

`1`,

`2`

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/messages/get-messages#response-created-at)

created\_at

integer

The time at which message was created

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/messages/get-messages#response-updated-at)

updated\_at

integer

The time at which message was updated

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/messages/get-messages#response-private)

private

boolean

The flags which shows whether the message is private or not

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/messages/get-messages#response-status)

status

enum<string>

The status of the message

Available options:

`sent`,

`delivered`,

`read`,

`failed`

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/messages/get-messages#response-source-id)

source\_id

string

The source ID of the message

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/messages/get-messages#response-content-type)

content\_type

enum<string>

The type of the template message

Available options:

`text`,

`input_select`,

`cards`,

`form`

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/messages/get-messages#response-content-attributes)

content\_attributes

object

The content attributes for each content\_type

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/messages/get-messages#response-sender-type)

sender\_type

enum<string>

The type of the sender

Available options:

`contact`,

`agent`,

`agent_bot`

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/messages/get-messages#response-sender-id)

sender\_id

number

The ID of the sender

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/messages/get-messages#response-external-source-ids)

external\_source\_ids

object

The external source IDs of the message

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/messages/get-messages#response-additional-attributes)

additional\_attributes

object

The additional attributes of the message

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/messages/get-messages#response-processed-message-content)

processed\_message\_content

string

The processed message content

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/messages/get-messages#response-sentiment)

sentiment

object

The sentiment of the message

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/messages/get-messages#response-conversation)

conversation

object

The conversation object

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/messages/get-messages#response-attachment)

attachment

object

The file object attached to the image

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/messages/get-messages#response-sender)

sender

object

User/Agent/AgentBot object
